string-array.name: inspirations
string-array.item: \"The secret to having it all is knowing you already do\" \nUnknown
\"Those who have the ability to be grateful are the ones who have the ability to achieve greatness\" \nSteve Maraboli
\"We must find time to stop and thank the people who make a difference in our lives\" \nJohn F Kennedy
\"This is a wonderful day. I\'ve never seen this day before\" \nMaya Angelou
\"Be a rainbow in someone else\'s cloud\" \nMaya Angelou
\"When we focus on our gratitude, the tide of disappointment goes out and the tide of love rushes in. \" \nKristin Armstrong
\"Let us be grateful to the people who make us happy\" \nMarcel Proust
\"A multitude of small delights constitutes happiness\" \nCharles Baudelaire
\"Gratitude is the memory of the heart\" \nJean Baptiste Massieu
\"All the great blessings of my life are present in my thoughts today\" \nPhoebe Cary
\"The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate\" \nOprah Winfrey
\"Be thankful for what you have; you\'ll end up having more.\" \nOprah Winfrey
\"We can only be said to be alive those moments when our hearts are conscious of their treasures\" \nThornton Wilder
\"Know yourself to improve yourself\" \nAuguste Compte
\"A quiet positive thought changed it all\" \nAvantik
\"Gratitude opens your eyes to the limitless potential of the universe\" \nStephen Richards
\"Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.\" \nRobert Brault
\"Reflect upon your present blessings, of which every man has plenty; not on your past misfortunes, of which all men have some.\" \nCharles Dickens
\"Acknowledging the good that you already have in your life is the foundation for all abundance.\" \nEckhart Tolle
\"Gratitude is a currency that we can mint for ourselves, and spend without fear of bankruptcy.\" \nFred De Witt Van Amburgh
\"He is a wise man who does not grieve for the things which he has not, but rejoices for those which he has.\" \nEpictetus
\"When I started counting my blessings, my whole life turned around\" \nWillie Nelson
\"The more grateful I am, the more beauty I see\" \nMary Davis
\"There is a calmness to a life lived in gratitude, a quiet joy.\" \nRalph H. Blum
\"The root of joy is gratefulness\" \nDavid Steindl-Rast
\"Gratitude is the sign of noble souls\" \nAesop
\"When you are grateful, fear disappears and abundance appears\" \nAnthony Robbins
\"The essence of all beautiful art, all great art, is gratitude.\" \nFriedrich Nietzsche
\"Wear gratitude like a cloak and it will feed every corner of your life\" \nRumi
\"If the only prayer you ever say in your life is Thank You, it will be enough\" \nMeister Eckhart
\"Gratitude turns what we have into enough\" \nMelody Beattie
\"Give thanks for a little and you will find a lot\" \nHausa Proverb
\"You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough\" \nMae West
\"When it comes to life the critical thing is whether you take things for granted or take them with gratitude\" \nG. K. Chesterton
\"Feeling gratitude and not expressing it is like wrapping a present and not giving it\" \nWilliam Arthur Ward
\"There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.\" \nAlbert Einstein
\"Gratitude changes the pangs of memory into a tranquil joy\" \nDietrich Bonhoeffer
\"Gratitude is riches. Complaint is poverty.\" \nDoris Day
\"Gratitude is when memory is stored in the heart and not in the mind\" \nLionel Hampton
\"Let us swell with gratitude and allow it to overwhelm us\" \nGrace Gealey
\"Silent gratitude isn\'t very much to anyone\" \nGertrude Stein
\"Fill the earth with your songs of gratitude\" \nCharles Spurgeon
\"You cannot do a kindness too soon, for you never know when it will be too late\" \nRalph Waldo Emerson
\"No one who achieves success does so without the help of others, the wise and confident acknowledge this help with gratitude\" \nAlfred North Whitehead
\"Find the good and praise it\" \nAlex Haley
\"Surprise is the seed of gratefulness. Become aware of surprises\" \nDavid Steindl-Rast
\"Gratitude is happiness doubled by wonder\" \nG. K. Chesterton
\"Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul\" \nHenry Ward Beecher
\"Happiness is not what makes us grateful. It is gratefulness that makes us happy.\" \nDavid Steindl-Rast
\"Abundance is not something we acquire. It is something we tune into.\" \nWayne W Dyer
\"Showing gratitude is one of the simplest yet most powerful things humans can do for each other\" \nRandy Pausch
\"Make visible what, without you, might perhaps never have been seen\" \nRobert Bresson
\"When you focus on the good, the good gets better\" \nAbraham Hicks
\"Be generous in prosperity, and thankful in adversity\" \nBahá’u’lláh
\"Gratitude is nothing if it\'s not felt\" \nJamie Varon
\"Drink from the well of your self and begin again\" \nCharles Bukowski
\"In the face of brokeness, gratitude has the power to heal. In the face of despair, gratitude has the power to bring hope.\" \nRobert A Emmons
\"Gratitude is not only the greatest of the virtues, it is the parent of all the others\" \nMarcus Tullius Cicero
\"Hold everything dear\" \nJohn Berger
\"As long as you are living there is more ahead of you\" \nMorgan Harper Nichols
\"I am worthy of the time it takes to do the things that heal my heart\" \nMorgan Harper Nichols
\"Your heart is still beating and there is still room for healing\" \nMorgan Harper Nichols
\"Choose celebration over comparison\" \nMorgan Harper Nichols
\"Walk as if you are kissing the Earth with your feet.\" \nThich Nhat Hanh
\"If I am not good to myself, how can I expect anyone else to be good to me?\" \nMaya Angelou
\"No matter what happens, or how bad it seems today, life does go on, and it will be better tomorrow\" \nMaya Angelou
\"If much has been denied me, much, very much, has been given me\" \nHelen Keller
\"For love casts out fear, and gratitude can conquer pride\" \nLouisa May Alcott
\"Embrace every new day with gratitude, hope and love\" \nLailah Gifty Akita
\"Never let the things you want make you forget the things you have\" \nSanchita Pandey
\"Usually, that which could have been better could have been worse\" \nMokokoma Mokhonoana
\"The soul that gives thanks can find comfort in everything\" \nHannah Whitall Smith
\"Living simply makes loving simple\" \nbell hooks
\"Love is an action, never simply a feeling\" \nbell hooks
\"There is light in darkness, you just have to find it\" \nbell hooks
\"Our feelings are our most genuine paths to knowledge\" \nAudre Lorde
\"At the end of the day, we can endure much more than we think we can\" \nFrida Kahlo
\"Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions\" \nDalai Lama XIV
\"We can never obtain peace in the outer world until we make peace with ourselves\" \nDalai Lama XIV
\"Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional\" \nHaruki Murakami
\"We only have what we give\" \nIsabel Allende
\"Write what should not be forgotten\" \nIsabel Allende
\"You are the storyteller of your own life, and you can create your own legend, or not.\" \nIsabel Allende
\"It\'s enough for me to be sure that you and I exist at this moment\" \nGabriel García Márquez
\"There is always something left to love\" \nGabriel García Márquez
\"If you see no reason to give thanks, the fault lies in yourself.\" \nTecumseh
\"Gratitude is the direct way out of comparison.\" \nRobyn Conley Downs
\"Optimism is a muscle that gets stronger with use\" \nRobin Roberts
\"Do what moves you. Embrace what gives you stillness\" \nQ. Gibson
\"Sit with your shallow parts and you will learn to survive the deepest tides\" \nQ. Gibson
\"Come closer to yourself there\'s always room\" \nQ. Gibson
\"My mind is a beautiful place, I water it well so that others can be fed from my garden\" \nQ. Gibson
\"You are the sky. Everything else is just weather\" \nPema Chödrön
\"Letting go of who I\'m not any longer, to make room for who I am\" \nLalah Delia
\"Healing only works if you surrender to its process\" \nLalah Delia
\"How liberating is it to pursue wholeness instead of perfection\" \nMorgan Harper Nichols

string-array.name: prompts
string-array.item: What is something that made you smile?
What is something to be grateful for in this room?
What makes you happy to be alive?
Who is someone that helped you?
Who is someone that has mentored you?
Who is someone that taught you something?
Who is someone that you love?
Who is someone that loves you?
Who is a friend that you are grateful for?
What in nature are you grateful for?
What talent or skill are you grateful for?
What memory are you grateful for?
Did someone help you on this day?
What made you feel happy on this day?
What are you proud of yourself for?
What about your upbringing are you thankful for?
What about your career or work are you grateful for?
What freedoms are you grateful for?
What is something that made you laugh?
What is one thing you are grateful for about yourself?
What was the most beautiful thing you saw on this day?
What book are you grateful for?
What song or music are you grateful for?
What is something that makes your life easier?
What is something that always cheers you up?
Who inspires you?
What technology or tool are you grateful for?
What opportunity are you grateful for?
What is something about your body or your health that you are grateful for?
What place are you grateful for?
What smell are you grateful for?
What taste are you grateful for?
What knowledge are you grateful for?
What is a simple pleasure you\'re grateful for?
What hobbies are you grateful for?
What sound are you grateful for?
What small thing are you grateful for?
What is something you are grateful to have learned?
What are you grateful for in your city or town?
What are you grateful for about your home?
What advice are you grateful to have heard?
What are you grateful for about your family?
What are you grateful for about the current season?
What activity are you grateful for?
